info.official_title: Cohort Study of Mechanism and Process Regulation for Colorectal Tumors

inclusion_lines.line: * Inclusion Criteria（Healthy control group）： 1) Aged more than 18 years; 2) Planned to undergo colonoscopy , without past medical history of neoplasm or ulcer or bleeding under colonoscopy regardless of the history of colonoscopy; 3) Willing to participate in this trial and signed the informed consent.

criterions.exact_snippets: Aged more than 18 years
Planned to undergo colonoscopy
without past medical history of neoplasm
without past medical history of ... ulcer
without past medical history of ... bleeding under colonoscopy
criterions.criterion: past medical history of bleeding under colonoscopy

criterions.exact_snippets: Willing to participate in this trial
signed the informed consent
Sporadic colorectal adenoma group
More than 18 years aged

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Diagnosed as colorectal adenoma, epithelial adenomatoid hyperplasia, serrated lesions, or with mild to moderate dysplasia (low-grade intraepithelial neoplasia) by colonoscopy and pathology;

criterions.exact_snippets: Diagnosed as colorectal adenoma
epithelial adenomatoid hyperplasia
serrated lesions
mild to moderate dysplasia (low-grade intraepithelial neoplasia)

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Signed the informed consent, willing to participate in this trial.

criterions.exact_snippets: Signed the informed consent
willing to participate in this trial
Aged more than 18 years

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Underwent endoscopic EMR/ESD or Surgical resection because of colorectal neoplasms and the lesion was confined to the mucosa or submucosa of the large intestine and was pathologically indicated to be adenocarcinoma;

criterions.exact_snippets: Underwent endoscopic EMR/ESD or Surgical resection
because of colorectal neoplasms
lesion was confined to the mucosa or submucosa of the large intestine
pathologically indicated to be adenocarcinoma

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Willing to participate in this trial and signed the informed consent.

criterions.exact_snippets: Willing to participate in this trial
signed the informed consent
Familial colorectal neoplasm group
Aged more than 18 years

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Underwent ESD/EMR resection or surgical resection and the pathology result considered as early colorectal cancer and adenoma, and the family history, pathology and genetic tests met the diagnostic criteria of FAP and HNPCC/LS;

criterions.exact_snippets: Underwent ESD/EMR resection or surgical resection
pathology result considered as early colorectal cancer and adenoma
family history, pathology and genetic tests met the diagnostic criteria of FAP
family history, pathology and genetic tests met the diagnostic criteria of ... HNPCC/LS

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Signed the informed consent, willing to participate in this trial. ·-Inclusion Criteria (Cohort study)

criterions.exact_snippets: Signed the informed consent
willing to participate in this trial
Aged 18-80 years

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Diagnosed as polypoid neoplasm or lateral developmental neoplasm (LST) by endoscopy without a family history of CRC and the pathologic manifestations were conventional adenoma or serrated lesions; the patients without a family history of CRC underwent ESD or EMR resection and the pathology result considered as early colorectal cancer; diagnosed as sporadic colorectal early carcinoma and adenoma with a family history of colorectal cancer (FAP, Lynch syndrome);

criterions.exact_snippets: Diagnosed as polypoid neoplasm or lateral developmental neoplasm (LST) by endoscopy
without a family history of CRC
pathologic manifestations were conventional adenoma or serrated lesions
patients without a family history of CRC underwent ESD or EMR resection
pathology result considered as early colorectal cancer
diagnosed as sporadic colorectal early carcinoma and adenoma with a family history of colorectal cancer (FAP, Lynch syndrome)
with a family history of colorectal cancer (FAP, Lynch syndrome)

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Signed the informed consent, willing to participate in this study and agreed with colonoscopy with pathology examination once a year and followed up for 5 years.

criterions.exact_snippets: Signed the informed consent
willing to participate in this study
agreed with colonoscopy with pathology examination once a year
followed up for 5 years
Healthy volunteers allowed

inclusion_lines.line: Must have minimum age of 18 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 18 Years

inclusion_lines.line: Must have maximum age of 75 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: maximum age of 75 Years

exclusion_lines.line: 1. With a medical history of digestive tract rerouting and partial resection;

criterions.exact_snippets: medical history of digestive tract rerouting
medical history of ... partial resection

exclusion_lines.line: 2. Patients with high risk of hereditary colorectal adenocarcinoma, i.e. family members of the following diseases: family history of gastrointestinal neoplasms, familial adenomatous polyposis (FAP), hereditary non-polyposis colorectal adenocarcinoma (HNPCC/LS), and P-J syndrome;

criterions.exact_snippets: high risk of hereditary colorectal adenocarcinoma
family history of gastrointestinal neoplasms
familial adenomatous polyposis (FAP)
hereditary non-polyposis colorectal adenocarcinoma (HNPCC/LS)
P-J syndrome

exclusion_lines.line: 3. With A history of chronic metabolic and inflammatory diseases such as hypertension, diabetes, chronic viral hepatitis, and inflammatory bowel disease and the chronic disease were difficult to control;

criterions.exact_snippets: history of chronic metabolic and inflammatory diseases such as hypertension
history of chronic metabolic and inflammatory diseases such as ... diabetes
history of chronic metabolic and inflammatory diseases such as ... chronic viral hepatitis
history of chronic metabolic and inflammatory diseases such as ... inflammatory bowel disease

exclusion_lines.line: 4. With other malignancies known to have advanced or require treatment in the past 5 years, except basal cell and squamous cell carcinoma of the skin that have been radically cured;

criterions.exact_snippets: other malignancies known to have advanced or require treatment in the past 5 years
basal cell and squamous cell carcinoma of the skin that have been radically cured
criterions.criterion: basal cell and squamous cell carcinoma of the skin

exclusion_lines.line: 5. With a history of active gastrointestinal bleeding within the last 6 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: history of active gastrointestinal bleeding within the last 6 months

exclusion_lines.line: 6. With a history of using broad-spectrum antibiotics and probiotics by oral or intravenous within the past 1 month;

criterions.exact_snippets: history of using broad-spectrum antibiotics ... within the past 1 month
history of using ... probiotics by oral or intravenous within the past 1 month

exclusion_lines.line: 7. Received routine immunosuppressive drugs for the past 6 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received routine immunosuppressive drugs for the past 6 months

exclusion_lines.line: 8. Unable or unwilling to cooperate with follow-up and related examinations;

criterions.exact_snippets: Unable or unwilling to cooperate with follow-up and related examinations
criterions.criterion: cooperation with follow-up and related examinations

exclusion_lines.line: 9. Patients who can not eat normally or need to rely on medicine or enema and other defecation;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients who can not eat normally
need to rely on medicine or enema and other defecation
criterions.criterion: reliance on medicine or enema for defecation

exclusion_lines.line: 10. With mental illness or any other serious cardiovascular disease;

criterions.exact_snippets: mental illness
serious cardiovascular disease

exclusion_lines.line: 11. With pregnant or lactating or planning to become pregnant within one year;

criterions.exact_snippets: pregnant
lactating
planning to become pregnant within one year

exclusion_lines.line: 12. Currently participating in, or receiving, an interventional clinical study that affects patients' treatment decisions.

criterions.exact_snippets: Currently participating in, or receiving, an interventional clinical study
affects patients' treatment decisions
